io.shardingsphere.core.rewrite

类 SQLRewriteEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.shardingsphere.core.rewrite.SQLRewriteEngine

  • public final class SQLRewriteEngine
extends Object
    SQL rewrite engine.

    Rewrite logic SQL to actual SQL, should rewrite table name and optimize something.

    作者:
    zhangliang, maxiaoguang

    • 构造器概要

      Constructs SQL rewrite engine.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SQLRewriteEngine

        public SQLRewriteEngine(ShardingRule shardingRule,
                        String originalSQL,
                        DatabaseType databaseType,
                        SQLStatement sqlStatement,
                        ShardingConditions shardingConditions,
                        List<Object> parameters)
        Constructs SQL rewrite engine.
        参数:
        shardingRule - databases and tables sharding rule
        originalSQL - original SQL
        databaseType - database type
        sqlStatement - SQL statement
        shardingConditions - sharding conditions
        parameters - parameters

    • 方法详细资料

      • rewrite

        public SQLBuilder rewrite(boolean isRewriteLimit)
        rewrite SQL.
        参数:
        isRewriteLimit - is rewrite limit
        返回:
        SQL builder

      • generateSQL

        public SQLUnit generateSQL(TableUnit tableUnit,
                           SQLBuilder sqlBuilder)
        Generate SQL string.
        参数:
        tableUnit - route table unit
        sqlBuilder - SQL builder
        返回:
        SQL unit
